title: Update assignment + info popup copy and bold step subheadings in assignment detail popups

requirements.summary: Replace the instructional text for the 5 fixed daily assignments in the in-challenge assignment detail popups with the user-provided new English copy.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening any assignment detail popup in the in-challenge screen shows the updated copy exactly matching the user-provided text for that assignment (including punctuation and the 1–3 minutes range).

The Small Steps Step 1 text reads: "Think of your current screen habits. Give yourself a rating from 0 to 10 that reflects how satisfied you are with your current screen behavior." (not the previous "drawing" wording).
The Awareness Step 3 paragraph includes: "Listen to your previous recordings and to those of others." (not "and, if relevant, to those of others").

file_operations.description: Fully replace the `content` strings for the 5 `FIXED_ASSIGNMENTS` (Awareness, Utopia, Small Steps, Support Strategies, Other Contemplations) with the exact new English copy provided by the user, ensuring the in-popup assignment details reflect the new text verbatim (including punctuation, line breaks, and the 1–3 minutes range).

requirements.summary: Render Step 1/2/3 subheading labels in bold within the new assignment detail text blocks, without changing typography globally.
acceptanceCriteria: In each assignment detail popup, the text "Step 1: ...", "Step 2: ...", and "Step 3: ..." headings are visually bold.
Only the new assignment detail text blocks are affected; no global typography change is introduced for other screens/components.

file_operations.description: Create a small, scoped renderer for assignment detail popup text that preserves existing whitespace/newlines while rendering only the step labels ("Step 1:", "Step 2:", "Step 3:") in bold and keeping the step body text normal weight.

Update the assignment detail popup body rendering (currently a plain `whitespace-pre-wrap` block) to use the new `AssignmentDetailText` renderer so step labels are bolded only inside these assignment detail popups, without altering any global text styles.

requirements.summary: Replace the Social Contemplation and About the challenge info popup content with the user-provided new English copy while keeping existing popup structure and bold section headings.
acceptanceCriteria: The Social Contemplation info popup includes the user-provided sections: "What is social contemplation", "Solution-focused psychology", and "Making meaning together", with their provided paragraphs.

The About the challenge info popup includes the user-provided intro line "Contemplate for about 15 to 30 minutes a day and let others inspire you" plus Step 1/2/3 and Privacy & Security content exactly as provided, including the final sentence: "If you end your participation in the challenge, all your data will be deleted".
Popup section headings in these info popups render bold (consistent with existing section heading styling).

file_operations.description: Fully replace the English copy for `infoPopups.socialContemplation` and `infoPopups.aboutChallenge` (trigger/title/description/sections) with the exact new English text provided by the user, preserving the current structure (title/description + sectioned body) and ensuring section headings match the specified headings verbatim.
